function.name: project.create_python
function.description: Composite: Scaffolds a complete, basic Python project using the `uv` toolchain. Creates a main file, gitignore, requirements, and a virtual environment with a specific Python version.

project_name.description: The name of the new project (e.g., 'data_analyzer').

python_version.description: The Python version to use for the `uv` virtual environment (e.g., '3.11', '3.12'). Defaults to '3.11'.

create_venv.description: Set to true to create a virtual environment using `uv`. Defaults to True.
